Unitron/Firestarter:


Firestarter smashed into the ground, forming a crater around him.  After a 
second of staying put, his treads kicked in, launching him out of the crater. 
 Firing off two sonic blasts from the barrel of his tank cannon, he let his 
automatic "laser rifle" mounted on the top of his tank mode fire rapid blasts 
at the autoguns as they shot him, bouncing off of his armor.

------

Unitrn laughed, the autogun shots knocking him back slightly.  Raising his 
rifle, he fired a single shot, optic blasts launched out, and a burst of 
flames, each blast at an individual autogun.
